name: Blasted (Guillaume Lefebvre)
description:
Survive the "Tests" rooms created by a strange character who talks to you through a TV screen...

In this small jam game : you control your character with WASD (or ZQSD if you picked it in the menu), use your sword with left click and shoot with right click.

This game was made in 2 days, during a private game jam organized at Pôle 3D (France) and was entierly created by Guillaume Lefebvre in Unity.
